meanings.definition: An abnormal enlargement of the veins within the scrotum.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with varicoceles after a physical examination.
meanings.sent2: Varicoceles can cause discomfort and affect fertility in men.
meanings.sent3: When he heard about varicoceles, he joked that his scrotum was becoming a balloon animal.
meanings.sent4: The varicoceles in his scrotum were like tangled vines, causing him pain.
meanings.sent5: The image of varicoceles in the scrotum stuck in his mind like a stubborn stain.

meanings.definition: The condition of having varicose veins in the scrotum.
meanings.sent1: His grandfather had surgery to treat his varicoceles many years ago.
meanings.sent2: Varicoceles are more common on the left side of the scrotum.
meanings.sent3: He teased his friend about his varicoceles, calling them 'scrotum snakes'.
meanings.sent4: The varicoceles in his scrotum resembled a twisted river on a map.
meanings.sent5: The sight of varicoceles in the scrotum was etched in his memory like a scar.
